name: First Data Visualization Project
tagline: A few scripts and data that I used to create a visualization
body:
#Data Visualization

This is my first project using d3.js and first attempt at data visualization in general.
It's just a basic map which uses geolocation to represent schools and either green, if
the average class sizes have been reduced in the last year, or red if they've increased.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
